occi:attribute.name: availability.term.type
occi:attribute.title: The type of the term that is being defined

occi:attribute.name: availability.term.state
occi:attribute.title: The state of fulfillment of the specific term

occi:attribute.name: availability.term.desc
occi:attribute.title: The description of the agreement term defined with this mixin

occi:attribute.name: availability.term.remedy
occi:attribute.title: The remedy value (e.g., price penalty) or action (e.g., command) when an SLO term is being violated
